Title: Are You There Shim? It's Me, Ian.
Writer: John Wells (developed for American television by), Paul Abbott (created by), Nancy M. Pimental
Actors: William H. Macy, Emmy Rossum, Jeremy Allen White, Ethan Cutkosky
Plot: Frank gets into trouble with the Hopkins Academy PTA. Fiona struggles with her decision to bail Ian out of jail, while he continues his Gay Jesus antics inside. Lip juggles taking care of Xan with a potential romance. Season premiere.
